channel.title: Would you pay 20$/month for your server to be Hosted on
channel.description:
Dual Intel Quadcore 5420 CPUs 12GB Ram, 2x500GB SATA Drives Unlimited Bandwidth [100Mbit Port]
I'm possibly going to give you 10 spots (Maybe even more) starting out at 20$ a month for this server.
[b]Note: You would ONLY get server hosting, in no way would you have FTP access to any parts of the servers, nor would you have any access at all. Any updates would have to be made via your side, then give to me to upload to the server.[/b]
I am also interested, as a Mopar user and enthusiast, in providing Moparscape possibly their own spot on the server for free for their own server.

item.title: Would you pay 20$/month for your server to be Hosted on

item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Anyway, why have a server without FTP?

item.title: Would you pay 20$/month for your server to be Hosted on
item.dc:creator: @benny679 benny679
item.description:
@benny679 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

But you would have to run how many of these $20 servers on there to make money? At least 10 or 15 I am sure, which would mean they would run horribly. Also, how would you make sure each user couldn’t access another user’s data by writing the java code to read their files? Overall it is just a really bad idea, it would be better for someone wanting a server to get their own server or VPS.

Yes I’m quoting the owner. Who cares. I dought anyone would pay so only 2 people would have servers running on his pc. So it would be fast -_-

Read full topic

item.title: Would you pay 20$/month for your server to be Hosted on
item.dc:creator: @benny679 benny679
item.description:
@benny679 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:323109”][quote author=dharok1337 link=topic=419521.msg3082244#msg3082244 date=1262235013]
Agh, glad for you to reply, wasn’t expect you to reply yourself, mopar :). I currently have a crockshit of sponsors that regularly give me benefits (That mostly includes free crap such as dedicated servers)

And I thought I could benefit MoparScape indefinately by offering spots for so cheap. Each server would have it’s own IP, while I am technical savvy, I don’t exactly know the full situation, maybe you could fully elaborate.

If anything, I would want this server to be used for a “Official MoparScape” server. Please contact me at Devin@forum-host.net
[/quote]

So you have unlimited IPs you can bind to on the server?

What I am concerned about, is that unless you run each server under a different account, AND have permissions set up correctly. With the right code in someone’s server they could look at, change, and even download other people’s servers, configuration, and passwords.[/quote]

So you warned me about saying that? 1, thats dumb (no offense mod) because if you have basic computer knowledge you can set up sharing folders than can be VPN accesses.
And spam? I’m just “asking” if people would.

Read full topic
item.source: Would you pay 20$/month for your server to be Hosted on

item.title: Would you pay 20$/month for your server to be Hosted on
item.dc:creator: @dharok1337 dharok1337
item.description:
@dharok1337 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:323109”][quote author=dharok1337 link=topic=419521.msg3082244#msg3082244 date=1262235013]
Agh, glad for you to reply, wasn’t expect you to reply yourself, mopar :). I currently have a crockshit of sponsors that regularly give me benefits (That mostly includes free crap such as dedicated servers)

And I thought I could benefit MoparScape indefinately by offering spots for so cheap. Each server would have it’s own IP, while I am technical savvy, I don’t exactly know the full situation, maybe you could fully elaborate.

If anything, I would want this server to be used for a “Official MoparScape” server. Please contact me at Devin@forum-host.net
[/quote]

So you have unlimited IPs you can bind to on the server?

What I am concerned about, is that unless you run each server under a different account, AND have permissions set up correctly. With the right code in someone’s server they could look at, change, and even download other people’s servers, configuration, and passwords.[/quote]

I get 10 IP’s default, and I am 99% sure I can buy more.

Good point. Whenever I get the server we can discuss security issues, possibly over MSN or such

Read full topic

item.title: Would you pay 20$/month for your server to be Hosted on
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“dharok1337, post:3, topic:323109”]Agh, glad for you to reply, wasn’t expect you to reply yourself, mopar :). I currently have a crockshit of sponsors that regularly give me benefits (That mostly includes free crap such as dedicated servers)

And I thought I could benefit MoparScape indefinately by offering spots for so cheap. Each server would have it’s own IP, while I am technical savvy, I don’t exactly know the full situation, maybe you could fully elaborate.

If anything, I would want this server to be used for a “Official MoparScape” server. Please contact me at Devin@forum-host.net :)[/quote]

So you have unlimited IPs you can bind to on the server?

What I am concerned about, is that unless you run each server under a different account, AND have permissions set up correctly. With the right code in someone’s server they could look at, change, and even download other people’s servers, configuration, and passwords.

item.title: Would you pay 20$/month for your server to be Hosted on
item.dc:creator: @benny679 benny679
item.description:
@benny679 wrote:

Would you pay $20 a month to be hosted oh my computer?

3 AMD CPU’s
180 Gig of ram
2000 hard drive space
VPN so you can change your server
super cooled system

Would ya?
Cause thats my comp.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2009, 11:29:26 am[/size][hr]Sorry, and 1000meg banwith
[center] Uncalled for and nothing but spam, don’t let it happen again. -moparisthebest[/center]

Read full topic
